attributes.action: Allow street lights in Mid & North Lancing to stay on during night hours
attributes.additional_details: The street lighting in Lancing turn off from around midnight until 5.30am every day. Due to the high level of residents in the area, this makes the paths and roads unsafe and dangerous. There have been recent burglaries in the area and many residents have expressed their concerns and that they wish to walk home in a safe and well lit environment.
